title: 1999/441/EC: Commission Decision of 28 June 1999 amending Decision 92/271/EEC concerning the importation into the Community of live animals and animal products originating in or coming via the Republic of Bosnia- Herzegovina (notified under document number C(1999) 1728) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 28 June 1999
amending Decision 92/271/EEC concerning the importation into the Community of live animals and animal products originating in or coming via the Republic of Bosnia-Herzegovina
(notified under document number C(1999) 1728)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/441/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article l of Decision 92/271/EEC is replaced by the following: "Article 1
Member States shall not authorise the importation of equidae originating in or coming from Bosnia and Herzegovina"
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
